contents: Skip to the content of this page ,  the main menu , the secondary menu , the site search form , the site home page .           Graduate College     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Graduate College      Graduate College   Main Menu    Admissions           Degree Admissions    Application Deadlines         Funding & Awards           Graduate Funding Overview    Fellowships & Awards    Other Funding         Programs           Graduate College Courses    Graduate Program in Neuroscience         Diversity           Recruitment    Fellows Mentoring & Support    DFI Program    PIF Program    PBRC-PREP Program    SROP Undergraduate Program         Academics           Dates & Events    Registration Info    Thesis    Exams & Defense    Policies & Procedures    TA Enrichment    Graduation Info    Student Forms    Student Resources         About Us           Staff Directory    Faculty Listings    Newsletters    Contact Us          Eyebrow menu    Faculty & Staff Resources    Alumni    +Give    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search               View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Graduate College    Diversity Matters    Recruitment        Recruitment       Recruitment   Welcome to the UIC Graduate College recruitment Web page.  Here you will find information on upcoming recruitment activities including participation in graduate fairs, national conferences and events scheduled within UIC. Faculty and staff are encouraged to participate in any of our scheduled recruitment events and/or provide us with informational materials for distribution. Additionally, you will also find links with the contact information of prospective UIC graduate students from previous recruitment activities.  Please include them when you reach out to students for your graduate programs.  UIC Faculty and staff can also access information on prospective applicants that registered to receive information about UIC graduate programs through the National Name Exchange . To view a complete list of all NNE participants filtered by discipline please click on the Fall 2019 NNE Filtered by Discipline.  You may find participants indicating Fall 2019 or Spring 2020 graduation by selecting the “Grad Year”  filter/tab.  The National McNair Scholars Directory for 2020 may be found here [forthcoming].  Please contact: Lunaire Ford , Assistant Dean, Recruitment & Diversity for more information. Click on the listed individual events to access the corresponding Excel spreadsheets containing student and or event information.  Recruitment Events, Dates and Locations:  Fall 2019  Vanderbilt/ National Name Exchange Feeder Program, September  23-25, 2019 Nashville, TN  National Association of African American Honors Programs – November, 6-9;  New Orleans, LA  Society of the Advancement of Chicanos and Naive Americans (SACNAS) Conference – October 31 – November 2, 2019; Honolulu, HI  American Biomedical Research Conference for Minority Students (ABRCMS) Conference –  November 13-16: Anaheim, CA    Spring 2020  Hampton University – February  Summer 2020  SAEOPP National McNair Conference ,  June – Atlanta, GA  Annual Ronald E. McNair Scholars Symposium at UC Berkeley .
